entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 1:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: ESE 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow or freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near noon then snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle late this evening. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Fog patches overnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
